services.title: Reflexology
services.summary: Deeply relaxing and restorative; supports nervous and immune systems, encourages detoxification.
services.description: A deeply relaxing, non-invasive therapy that supports the nervous and immune systems, encourages detoxification and restores balance. By stimulating reflex points mapped to the body's organs and systems, Reflexology helps release stagnation and promotes natural healing.
bullets: Calms the nervous system and boosts immunity
Stimulates mapped reflex points to release stagnation

services.title: Facial Reflexology
services.summary: Powerfully calming; boosts circulation, eases tension and rejuvenates skin.
services.description: Combines cleanse, hot towel steam and luxury facial massage. Powerfully calming for the nervous system due to proximity to cranial nerves; boosts circulation, eases tension and rejuvenates skin for a radiant, relaxed complexion.
bullets: Cleanse, hot towel steam and luxury facial massage
Supports cranial nerves for deep relaxation

services.title: Pre-Conceptual & Pregnancy Reflexology
services.summary: Supports hormonal balance, reduces stress and helps during pregnancy.
services.description: Supports hormonal balance, reduces stress and prepares the body for conception and a healthy pregnancy. During pregnancy, it helps ease common symptoms and maintain equilibrium. Post-partum, it aids recovery and re-balancing.
notes: Not carried out in the first trimester.

services.title: Zone Face Lift
services.summary: Award-winning holistic facial; lifts, sculpts and revives with a natural glow.
services.description: An award-winning holistic facial combining facial reflexology, sculpting Gua Sha and specialised massage. Promotes collagen and elastin, de-puffs and lifts for a brighter appearance — while leaving you deeply relaxed.
bullets: Facial reflexology, sculpting Gua Sha and specialised massage
De-puffs and lifts face and neck

policies.cancellation: 24 hours' notice to cancel or rearrange; otherwise full fee applies.
policies.consultation: Please complete the consultation form before your treatment.
policies.mobile: Mobile visits within 5 miles of W9 carry a £10 fee.

testimonials.quote: Romilly's treatments are so therapeutic — I could feel the tension melting away. After 4 sessions I felt physically rejuvenated and emotionally refreshed.
testimonials.author: Alexandra S

testimonials.quote: The facial reflexology was incredible. Not only did my skin look radiant, but I felt so calm and centred afterwards.
testimonials.author: Sarah M

testimonials.quote: Romilly helped me so much during my pregnancy. Her gentle approach and expertise made all the difference to my wellbeing.
testimonials.author: Emma T

recommends.name: Hayou Method Bamboo Body Tapper
recommends.description: Gentle body tapping for circulation and lymphatic drainage

recommends.name: Theta Naturals Co. Connect & Restore Bath Salts
recommends.description: Mineral-rich salts for deep relaxation and muscle relief

recommends.name: White Sage Smudge Stick

about.short: I'm Romilly — a qualified Reflexologist trained at the London School of Reflexology and a member of the Association of Reflexologists. I specialise in women's health across Reflexology, Facial Reflexology, Pre-conceptual & Pregnancy Reflexology, and Zone Face Lift. My approach is gentle, restorative and tailored to help you feel calm, balanced and well.
about.long: Welcome to With Romilly. I'm a qualified Reflexologist, trained at the prestigious London School of Reflexology and a member of the Association of Reflexologists. My practice focuses on women's health and wellbeing, offering a sanctuary where you can truly relax, rebalance and restore. I specialise in traditional Reflexology, Facial Reflexology, Pre-conceptual & Pregnancy Reflexology, and the award-winning Zone Face Lift technique. My approach is gentle, restorative and completely tailored to your individual needs. Whether you're seeking stress relief, support during pregnancy, or simply want to reconnect with your sense of calm, I'm here to guide you on that journey.
qualifications: Qualified Reflexologist, London School of Reflexology
Member of the Association of Reflexologists
Specialist in women's health and pregnancy
